SELECT il.id, il.inquiry_code, il.quotation_deadline, il.inquirer, il.inquirer_tel, il.inquiry_date, il.COMMENT, il.remark, il.inquiry_status, il.round_num, il.inquiry_name, il.invitation_method, il.currency, il.is_one, il.is_notice, il.project_id, il.request_id, il.create_user, il.create_time, il.attachment, il.other_attachment, pb.proj_name as project_name, prm.req_type, prm.attachment as purAttachment, prm.other_attachment as pur_other_attachment, prm.comment purComment FROM inquiry_list il left join proj_base pb on il.project_id = pb.id left join purchase_request_main prm on il.request_id = prm.id WHERE il.del_flag = '0'
AND il.inquiry_code LIKE concat(concat('%',#{query.inquiryCode}),'%')
AND il.inquiry_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{query.inquiryName}),'%')
AND prm.req_type = #{query.reqType}
AND il.invitation_method = #{query.invitationMethod}
AND il.inquiry_status = #{query.inquiryStatus}
AND il.create_user = #{query.auther}
AND (select depart_ids from sys_user su where il.create_user = su.username) = #{query.auther}
AND pb.subject in
#{item}
order by il.inquiry_code
order by il.inquiry_name
order by pb.proj_name
order by il.invitation_method
order by prm.req_type
order by il.inquiry_status
order by il.create_user
order by il.quotation_deadline
order by il.create_time
asc
desc

SELECT il.inquiry_code, il.quotation_deadline, il.inquirer, il.inquirer_tel, il.inquiry_date, il.COMMENT, il.remark, il.inquiry_status, il.round_num, il.inquiry_name, il.invitation_method, sq.currency, sq.tax_rate, il.is_one, il.is_notice, il.project_id, il.request_id, il.create_user, il.create_time, il.attachment, pb.proj_name as project_name, pb.proj_code, prm.req_type, prm.category_id, ir.inquiry_id, ir.id, ir.prod_name, ir.unit_id, ir.spe_type, ir.prod_code, iss.id as bs_id, iss.inquiry_qty as qty, bs.name as supp_name, sd.id as contractFirstPartyId, sd.depart_name as contractFirstParty, sd.mobile as contractFirstTelphone, sd.fax as contractFirstFax, sd.address as contractFirstAddress, sd.contacter as contractFirstContact, sd.corporate as contractFirstLegalPerson, sd.agent as contractFirstAgent, sd.bank_name as contractFirstOpeningBank, sd.bank_account as contractFirstBankAccount, sd.post_code as contractFirstPostCode FROM inquiry_record ir left join inquiry_list il on ir.inquiry_id = il.id left join proj_base pb on il.project_id = pb.id left join sys_depart sd on pb.subject = sd.id left join purchase_request_main prm on il.request_id = prm.id left join inquiry_supplier iss on ir.id = iss.record_id left join bas_supplier bs on iss.supplier_id = bs.id left join sup_quote sq on ir.id = sq.record_id and iss.supplier_id = sq.supp_id WHERE ir.del_flag = '0' and iss.is_contract = '0' and iss.del_flag = '0' and iss.is_recommend = '1'
AND il.create_user = #{query.auther}
AND (select depart_ids from sys_user su where il.create_user = su.username) = #{query.auther}
AND pb.subject in
#{item}
AND il.inquiry_code LIKE concat(concat('%',#{query.inquiryCode}),'%')
AND il.inquiry_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{query.inquiryName}),'%')
AND prm.req_type = #{query.reqType}
AND il.invitation_method = #{query.invitationMethod}
AND il.inquiry_status = #{query.inquiryStatus}
order by il.inquiry_code
order by il.inquiry_name
order by bs.name
order by pb.proj_name
order by ir.prod_code
order by ir.prod_name
order by iss.inquiry_qty
order by il.invitation_method
order by prm.req_type
order by il.inquiry_status
order by il.create_time
asc
desc
SELECT DISTINCT bs.id, bs.NAME FROM inquiry_supplier iss INNER JOIN bas_supplier bs ON iss.supplier_id = bs.id WHERE iss.del_flag = '0' and iss.inquiry_id = #{id}
